constituent: Inst., pinnacle, parthenon, acropolis, perfect, house, beginnings, two, human legs
heisigStory: This key word, the abbreviation for Institution, represents the use of that word as a suffix affixed to certain buildings and organizations. Its primitive elements: pinnacle . . . perfect.
koohiiStory1: The Institution of The Pinnacle is perfect in every way. It is the new House of God, his chosen city.
koohiiStory2: To reach the pinnacle of kanji perfect you need to attend the Heisig Inst.
